items.description: HackGPT Enterprise is a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed for enterprise security teams. It combines advanced AI, machine learning, microservices architecture, and comprehensive security frameworks to deliver professional-grade cybersecurity assessments.

items.name: RainML-daily--Reconstruction
items.description: Python-based multi-stage framework for daily rainfall time-series reconstruction in seasonal tropical forest ecosystems using unsupervised anomaly detection, bias-corrected reanalysis and satellite data, and multi-objective machine learning selection.

items.name: mirna-candidiasis-bioinformatics
items.description: Bioinformatics and Machine Learning framework for in silico prediction of candidiasis-related microRNAs. Includes data processing, feature engineering, and ML models for miRNA-disease association prediction.

items.name: RTL-Timing-Prediction-Machine-Learning-Framework-for-VLSI-Design-Automation
items.description: A machine learning framework to predict VLSI circuit delays from RTL metrics. Using 20 designs and ensemble techniques, it achieved 3.28% MAPE‚Äîfar better than the 10% target. The system integrates multiple models, Bayesian optimization, SHAP explainability, delivers a production API with 12‚ÄØms latency and 90% confidence intervals.

items.name: folax
items.description: Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.
